scripts.allure:report: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.qa:sanity:allure: cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test --grep @Sanity --headed && node ./utilitis/allureEnvWriter.js && allure generate ./allure-results --clean && npm run allure:report
scripts.qa:test:regression:allure: cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test --grep @Regression --headed && node ./utilitis/allureEnvWriter.js && allure generate ./allure-results --clean && npm run allure:report
scripts.prod:sanity:allure: cross-env ENV=PROD npx playwright test --grep @Sanity --headed && node ./utilitis/allureEnvWriter.js && allure generate ./allure-results --clean && npm run allure:report
scripts.prod:test:regression:allure: cross-env ENV=PROD npx playwright test --grep @Regression --headed && node ./utilitis/allureEnvWriter.js && allure generate ./allure-results --clean && npm run allure:report
